philosophy.title: A Space for Harmony and Self-Development
philosophy.paragraph1: We create a space where life becomes brighter. Our mission is to make rest and self-care not an obligation, but a pleasure. KAIF is a place where you restore your strength, recharge your batteries and enjoy every moment.
philosophy.paragraph2: Everything here is designed so that you want to come back: workouts that inspire, relaxation that fills you up, and an atmosphere that gives you a real buzz. We believe that harmony is not a luxury, but a necessity, and we make it available to you.
philosophy.quote: Health is not just the absence of disease, but a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being
philosophy.imageAlt: KAIF - a space for harmony and self-development

about.description1: KAIF PHUKET is a premium complex where you restore your strength, recharge your energy and enjoy every moment. Everything here is created so that you want to return: workouts that inspire, relaxation that fills, and an atmosphere that gives real pleasure.
about.description2: We have created a unique space in Phuket where premium service meets Thai hospitality. KAIF is not just a spa complex, it's a philosophy of healthy lifestyle and harmony.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

what_includes.question: What does the KAIF complex include?
what_includes.answer: KAIF is a unique complex in Phuket where you can combine activity, relaxation and self-care in one place. The territory includes: modern gym, Olympic pool with relaxation zones, dance and functional training studio, martial arts hall, beauty studio, SPA with Russian sauna, Thai hammam and massage services, restaurant with Eastern cuisine, Russian classics and barbecue dishes.

working_hours.question: What are the complex's operating hours?
working_hours.answer: We operate daily from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM. Some zones (SPA, restaurant) may have separate schedules. We recommend checking the operating hours of specific services when booking.

how_to_book.question: How to book services?
how_to_book.answer: Booking is available through our website, mobile app, by phone +66 76 123 456 or WhatsApp. We recommend booking in advance, especially for SPA treatments and restaurant tables.

memberships.question: Can I purchase memberships?
memberships.answer: Yes! We have various memberships: daily, weekly, monthly and annual. Combined packages including multiple services with up to 30% discount are also available.

experience_needed.question: Is experience required for classes?
experience_needed.answer: No! We have programs for all fitness levels. Beginners get introductory briefings, personal consultations and "first steps" programs for safe workout start.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment_methods.answer: We accept cash (THB, USD, EUR), all system bank cards, mobile payments, cryptocurrencies and bank transfers. Installment plans are available for large service packages.

loyalty_program.question: Is there a loyalty program?
loyalty_program.answer: Yes! KAIF Rewards program offers cumulative discounts, friend referral bonuses, exclusive events and priority booking. Earned points can be spent on any services.

support.title: Support Service
support.description: Our team is ready to help you during business hours. Contact us in any convenient way.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Chat
whatsapp.description: Quick responses in messenger. Booking, questions, support - all in one chat.

consultation.title: Personal Consultations
consultation.description: Individual approach to each guest. We'll help create a program for your goals.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our SPA services and treatments

services.question: What SPA services do you offer?
services.answer: We offer a full range of SPA services: massage (Thai, oil, sports), cosmetology treatments, laser hair removal, manicure, pedicure, hair care, as well as sauna and hammam.

booking.question: How to book a SPA treatment?
booking.answer: You can book by phone +66 62 480 5877, via WhatsApp or in person at our center. We recommend booking in advance, especially for popular treatments.

policy.question: What are the cancellation rules?
policy.answer: Please notify us of cancellation at least 24 hours before the scheduled time. Cancellation less than 24 hours in advance may incur a 50% cancellation fee.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept cash (THB, USD, EUR), bank cards of all systems, as well as mobile payments. Payment is made after the treatment.

preparation.question: Do I need to bring anything with me?
preparation.answer: We provide everything you need: towels, robes, slippers and cosmetic products. You just need to come and relax.

gifts.question: Are there gift certificates?
gifts.answer: Yes! We offer gift certificates of various denominations for any SPA services. They can be purchased at our center or ordered by phone.

booking.title: Book a Treatment
booking.description: Book a SPA treatment or beauty service for complete relaxation

phone.title: Call to Book
phone.description: Contact us by phone for quick booking. Our consultants will help you choose the right treatment and time.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Chat
whatsapp.description: Message us on WhatsApp for convenient booking. We will respond quickly and help you choose the best time.

hero.title: Reach new sports heights with KAIF
hero.subtitle: Our premium sports facilities are designed to accommodate various fitness levels and goals.

gym.section_subtitle: Discover the world of fitness and sports at KAIF Jungle Club. Our modern services are designed to give you the opportunity to train with pleasure and reach new heights.
gym.title: Gym
gym.description1: Spacious modern gym with cardio and strength equipment of high class. The gym is equipped with everything necessary for full-fledged training and maintaining physical fitness.
gym.description2: Guests have access to personal lockers, showers, as well as personal trainer services by appointment.

dance.title: Dance Studio
dance.description1: Spacious dance studio with professional parquet flooring, mirrored walls and modern audio system.
dance.description2: The studio offers group and individual lessons in various directions: modern dance, ballroom dancing, yoga, stretching, pilates and other directions.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Captured moments of sports life at KAIF Jungle Club & SPA. Join our community and share your own achievements

schedule.title: SCHEDULE
schedule.subtitle: SELECT DAY OF WEEK
schedule.description: Weekly class schedule with professional instructors
schedule.coming_soon: Training schedule will be available soon. For current information, please contact us.

facilities.title: Modern sports spaces
facilities.subtitle: KAIF offers a wide selection of premium sports spaces with cutting-edge equipment and professional trainers to help you achieve your fitness goals.

gym.title: Gym
gym.description1: Our gym is equipped with modern premium equipment from leading manufacturers. Here you will find everything you need for effective workouts - from free weights to the latest generation of cardio machines.
gym.description2: The spacious room with panoramic windows creates the perfect atmosphere for training, and professional trainers are always ready to help create an individual program.
gym.feature1: Premium Technogym and Life Fitness equipment

fight.title: Fight Club
fight.description1: KAIF Fighting Club is a modern space for training in various martial arts. Professional ring, punching bags, heavy bags, and special flooring create ideal conditions for both beginners and experienced fighters.
fight.description2: Our trainers are experienced fighters and champions who will help you master techniques and achieve high results in your chosen martial art.
fight.feature2: Boxing, Muay Thai, and MMA training

fight_club.title: Fight Club
fight_club.description1: KAIF Fighting Club is a modern space for training in various martial arts. Professional ring, punching bags, heavy bags, and special flooring create ideal conditions for both beginners and experienced fighters.
fight_club.description2: Our trainers are experienced fighters and champions who will help you master techniques and achieve high results in your chosen martial art.
fight_club.feature2: Boxing, Muay Thai, and MMA training

dance.title: Dance Studio
dance.description1: Spacious dance studio with professional flooring, mirrored walls and advanced audio system creates ideal conditions for various dance styles and group classes.
dance.description2: Classes in modern and classical dance styles are held here, as well as group fitness training under the guidance of experienced instructors.
dance.feature4: Flexible schedule for group and individual classes
